topic.title: Front Matter and Back Matter - Input XML fragment

body.p: The frontmatter topics are wrapped in an oxy:front-matter element, that has the class bookmap/frontmatter (it is a clone of the original frontmatter element from the map):
body.codeblock: <bookmap xmlns:ditaarch="http://dita.oasis-open.org/architecture/2005/" ...> <oxy:front-page xmlns:oxy="http://www.oxygenxml.com/extensions/author"> ... </oxy:front-page> <oxy:front-matter xmlns:oxy="http://www.oxygenxml.com/extensions/author" class="- map/topicref bookmap/frontmatter "> <concept xmlns:dita-ot="http://dita-ot.sourceforge.net/ns/201007/dita-ot" class="- topic/topic concept/concept " id="unique_1" oid="concept-1"> </oxy:front-matter>
